duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain the physical condition of the property including general cleanliness and upkeep of indoor and outdoor common areas.
Perform physically demanding work to maintain the asset and minimize liability concerns.
Remove debris, sweep, and maintain the property's lawn and landscaping features.
Repair and maintain property features, including irrigation systems, pool and spa equipment, and exterior lighting.
Promote safety awareness and emergency procedures for the property.
Undertake training related to job duties as necessary.

education_certification.credential: High school/GED or trade school diploma and one year of full-time experience in grounds maintenance, or an equivalent combination of education and experience.
